db:abstract.db:para: The QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl class provides access to the gapless playback related control of a QMediaService.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: If a QMediaService supports gapless playback it will implement QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl. This control provides a means to set the next media or crossfade time for smooth transitions between tracks.
The functionality provided by this control is exposed to application code through the QMediaPlayer class.
The interface name of QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl is org.qt-project.qt.mediagaplessplaybackcontrol/5.0 as defined in QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new gapless playback control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::advancedToNextMedia()
db:section.db:para: Signals when the player advances to the next media (the content of next media will be cleared).

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] qreal QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::crossfadeTime() const
db:section.db:para: Returns current crossfade time in seconds.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::crossfadeTimeChanged(qreal crossfadeTime)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the crossfadeTime has changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::isCrossfadeSupported() const
db:section.db:para: Indicates whether crossfading is supported or not. If crossfading is not supported, setCrossfadeTime() will be ignored and crossfadeTime() will always return 0.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QMediaContent QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::nextMedia() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the content of the next media

db:section.db:title: void QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::nextMediaChanged(const QMediaContent &media)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the next media has changed (either explicitly via setNextMedia() or when the player clears the next media while advancing to it).

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::setCrossfadeTime(qreal crossfadeTime)
db:section.db:para: Sets the crossfadeTime in seconds for smooth transition.

Positive value means how much time it will take for the next media to transit from silent to full volume and vice versa for current one. So both current and the next one will be playing during this period of time.
A crossfade time of zero or negative will result in gapless playback (suitable for some continuous media).

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl::setNextMedia(const QMediaContent &media)
db:section.db:para: Sets the next media for smooth transition.

db:section.db:title: QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl class.
